title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 361-8.2 - Exempt facilities
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 361-8.2 - Exempt facilities

State Regulations

Facilities receiving no more than a total of 1,000
gallons per year of source-separated used cooking oil and/or yellow grease for
processing, when the resultant fuel, feedstock, or ingredient is used only
on-site or in facility-owned vehicles and not offered for distribution or sale
to other entities, are exempt from this Subpart. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
361-8.2

Adopted

New

York State Register September 20, 2017/Volume XXXIX, Issue 38, eff. 11/4/2017

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
